unnormalised: Yeah, the reception's at The Grand Imperial, 7/A, MG Road, Bangalore, 560001; but the main ceremony is at our ancestral home in Kerala, near the temple, you probably won't find it on Google Maps!
normalised: Yeah, the reception's at The Grand Imperial, seven A, M-G Road, Bangalore, five hundred and sixty thousand and one; but the main ceremony is at our ancestral home in Kerala, near the temple, you probably won't find it on Google Maps!
